Text: Can anyone tell me why its really hard to get AVI Files for TV Show now, everything seems to be in other formats. WHY PLEASE

@LEE1237  The x264 codec has much better quality and is half the size of a typical Xvid file. So the download is faster and quality is better. If you have trouble playing them, get VLC player, it plays every thing. THANKS FOR THE UP TVTEAM!
